alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:07PM MDT until July 20 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 406 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Kutch, or 22 miles southwest of Limon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kutch and Punkin Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
